attributes.action: name and shame people who do not clean up their dog foul
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i propose people who do not clean up after their dogs should be named and shamed. nothing in our area is actually being done you play dogg taking the kids to school after all the dog poo. i propose if you see someebody not cleaning up after their dog the should have their picture made public ie photo and a fine should be awarded and enforced just think of all the parents who would be happy no more cleaning dog poo off kids shoes. and no more cleaning dog poo off our own shoes ..

i am a dog owner if it poops i scoop easy job to do (mine is a big dog)
